review: It is so easy to use. Plugged it in and away it went. Was so happy with it.
author: Lachelle Yoder

review: The overall experience it's a bit slow if you are used to other streaming devices like the Apple TV. The menus also are not as clean, but overall it does it's job. I would not buy another one though.
author: Matteo

review: Wish I could access the internet to stream online if not would be a five star product.
author: Daniel macias

review: The Fire Stick is absolutely wonderful. It is a perfect addition and easy to navigate. Thank you Amazon for another fantastic product.
author: ciellalv

review: I'm enjoying the Fire TV stick and Amazon Prime Videos. It's easy for me to use.
author: J. W. Carney "Sewing Fun"

review: easy to install and to get the programs I want
author: Dora Closson

review: Does everything it claimed, great picture (on a less-than-optimal Wi-Fi network), brainless setup and use.
author: Brian Hughes
